title: Bull
description: Fiction. Women's Studies. LGBT Studies. Disorienting and illuminating, playful and often penetrating, the stories of Kathy Anderson astonish.  She has already established herself as a powerful new voice on the national literary scene. The stories contained in Bull are marvelous pleasures, whether taken one at a time or gobbled ravenously. -- David Lynn, editor of The Kenyon Review
author: Kathy  Anderson
